definition: to pair up/to match up/to form a pair (e.g. to marry)/to mate/matched pair
to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
complementary base pairing e.g. adenine A 腺嘌呤 pairs with thymine T 胸腺嘧啶 in DNA
pinyin: jian3 ji1 hu4 bu3 pei4 dui4

definition: base pairing (e.g. adenine A 腺嘌呤 pairs with thymine T 胸腺嘧啶 in DNA)/base pair

sentences.english: Some matchmaking services cater to blood type.
sentences.chinese: 有些婚介所还根据血型提供配对服务。

sentences.english: These are some of the basic compatibility traits between Capricorn and Pisces zodiac signs.
sentences.chinese: 这些事摩羯和双鱼配对的基本特征。

sentences.english: Sepals oblong or linear, erect or spreading, base of lateral pair saccate .
sentences.chinese: 萼片长圆形或线形，直立或开展，基于侧配对。

sentences.english: Assortative mating Sexual reproduction in which the pairing of male and female is not random.
sentences.chinese: 有性生殖中配对的雌雄双方不足随机交配的现象。

sentences.english: Automatic search for opponent would rule-out players from your blacklist.
sentences.chinese: 自动找对手会排除与坏人棋友的配对。

sentences.english: They are more reproductively successful than unpaired females.
sentences.chinese: 和未配对的雌性相比，她们更能成功繁衍后代。

sentences.english: Jane paired off with Alice in a table tennis doubles match.
sentences.chinese: 在乒乓球双打比赛中简与爱丽丝配对。

sentences.english: Take parts in pair work or group work.
sentences.chinese: 请参与配对或分组活动进行。

sentences.english: Before entering their rooms, they still did the routine work and drew the lot.
sentences.chinese: 进入房间前，他们又按惯例抓阄配对。

sentences.english: Bivalent Describing any pair of homologous chromosomes when they pair up during MEIOSIS.
sentences.chinese: 在减数分裂中配对时的任意一对同源染色体。

sentences.english: Bluetooth should now correctly turn on and pair "out of the box" without tweaking.
sentences.chinese: 蓝牙功能现在应该可以灰常顺利地打开和配对。

sentences.english: The Lakers have former MVP Kobe Bryant pairing with Fisher in their starting back-court.
sentences.chinese: 湖人的后卫阵容有前MVP科比和费舍尔的配对。

sentences.english: Performed as the self-contrast of randomized paired design.
sentences.chinese: 随机化配对设计的自身对照方法。

sentences.english: Three matings between these mutants have been performed as shown in the table below.
sentences.chinese: 三个突变种之间的三种配对方式如下表所示。

sentences.english: SMILES HD, the cheerful award winning solitaire-like and arcade matching game.
sentences.chinese: 的获奖接龙般的和街机配对游戏。

definition: binding (loanword)/to bind (e.g. an account to a mobile phone number)
to try to answer a question (in a quiz, guessing game, riddle etc)/quiz game
